Description: Foot and part of lower wall of black-glazed pottery bowl; ring foot, ridge on outer face, grooved on resting surface; dip-glazed black inside and outside; interior slightly misfired red (stacking ring); outer face of foot, resting surface and underside reserved; inscription cut on underside.
Curator's comments: For the fabric and shape compare the smaller British Museum 1910,0222.169.
Bibliographic references: Petrie 1886 / Naukratis. Part I., 1884-85 (pl. XXXIV, no. 550)
Bernand 1970 / Le Delta égyptien d'après les textes grecs, i: les confins libyques (p. 673, no. 317)
Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GS.114)
